attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Having read on today, that Gordon Brown has confirmed an inquiry will be held to learn "all possible lessons" from the Iraq war - but resisted calls for it to be held immediately, the petitioner is calling on the P.M :

1. To pay more attention to online petitions
2. Address calls for someone senior to attend the NW health authority
3. Just in case there is anything dodgy in your mind, can I point out :
1. How pissed off I am about a) Lloyds management of my bank loan, the death threats against my life, constatnt calls from an incompetent overseas Collectiond Centre, my student debt, my medical condition following a road traffic accident and the lack of concern demonstrated by your admin. for my welfare and economic insurance .
2. How big my big bro is,three cousins have been in the SAS and are prop forwards
3. Another of my big, big bros is in newspapers
4. Should any of this go to court, i shall probably have some of Europe's finest legal representation
5. How my assignment got from Cherie Blair's hands into the newspapers .... 
Unlock the key of your inquiry, unless another F'in Profumo .... 
do you wish to settle this out of court ?

You owe me one ...

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
